relevant_findings.musculoskeletal: Cortical thickening in long bones, umbilical hernia

relevant_findings.creatine_kinase: Raised CK-MM levels (normalized following T4 therapy)

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Tachycardia improved after stopping T4 therapy and re-starting it.

vital_signs.heart_rate: Basal heart rate within hypothyroid range initially, improved after treatment

relevant_findings.basal_metabolic_rate: Subnormal before treatment, increased with T4 therapy
relevant_findings.muscle_enzymes: Raised skeletal muscle CK normalized following T4 treatment

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Basal metabolic rate increased with thyroxine therapy; CK levels normalized.
